00042         void SetLabelCount(size_t labelCount)
00043         {
00044                 if (m_labelCount != labelCount) {
00045                         m_labelCount = labelCount;
00046                         FireAxisChanged();
00047                 }
00048         }
00049 
00054         void IntegerValues(bool intValues = true)
00055         {
00056                 if (m_intValues != intValues) {
00057                         m_intValues = intValues;
00058                         // TODO recalc tick steps
00059                         FireAxisChanged();
00060                 }
00061         }
